<script>
  function downloadPDF() {
    const pdfUrl = './profilio.pdf';
		const link = document.createElement('a');
		link.href = pdfUrl;
		link.download = 'Muhammatjan[profilio].pdf'; 
		document.body.appendChild(link);
		link.click();
		document.body.removeChild(link);			
  }
</script>
